metadata.Title: CVE-2021-45102 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in HTCondor 9.0.x before 9.0.4 and 9.1.x before 9.1.2. When authenticating to an HTCondor daemon using a SciToken, a user may be granted authorizations beyond what the token should allow.

criterions.comment: condor: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
